name: Wowzer
tag_list: ovia, video-interviews, online-recruitment, video-interviewing, inovaz, talent-acquisition, sourcing, recruiting
overview:
Wowzer enables high-quality interactions between hiring companies and jobseekers through its web-based video interviewing platform. Candidates see a consistent, positive employment brand experience while recruiters and hiring managers enjoy the benefits of a face-to-face interview using less time and resources than phone screening.

With Wowzer, companies have seen cost savings of up to 85% from higher efficiency of identifying the best-match talent for their teams.

milestones.description: UCL MS&I Department use OVIA to screen international candidates
milestones.source_description: Video Interviewing for UCL Admissions - www.OVIA.me

milestones.description: UCL MS&I department begin using OVIA to screen graduate candidates
milestones.source_description: Video Interviewing for UCL Admissions - www.OVIA.me

milestones.description: Ovia announces investment from Recruit, rebrands to Wowzer

milestones.description: Wowzer announces investment from Recruit, rebrands to Wowzer
milestones.source_description: Are you good on video? Your next job may depend on it | VentureBeat

milestones.description: Wowzer launches Fall 2012 Release featuring integrations with Oracle Taleo, Salesforce.com
